text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump “Tears in their eyes. Death in their mouths” - a nurse describes her colleagues as they leave their shifts outside a Brooklyn Hospital. They are front line health care workers in crisis taking care of #coronavirus patients. Not enough PPE, not enough nurses. H/t @maddow
